name: Homestead
description: Licensed electrical contractors serving Homestead, Florida. Solomon Electric provides professional residential and commercial electrical services to the South Dade community, from agriculture hubs to new suburban developments.
tagline: Gateway to the Florida Keys & Everglades

challenges.title: Rural & Agricultural Power
challenges.description: Properties in Homestead's Redland and agricultural areas often require specialized wiring for outbuildings, irrigation systems, and heavy machinery.

challenges.title: Severe Weather Resilience
challenges.description: As the southernmost city in Miami-Dade, Homestead is often at the forefront of storm patterns. We provide surge protection and generator systems designed for high-impact zones.

challenges.title: Rapid Suburban Growth
challenges.description: New residential developments in Homestead require electricians who understand contemporary building codes and high-efficiency smart home integration.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Homestead?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Homestead including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Homestead neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Homestead?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Miami-Dade County permits for electrical work in Homestead, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Homestead home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Homestead homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Homestead.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Homestead?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Homestead neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you install standby generators in Homestead?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in home standby generator installations. Homestead frequently faces storm challenges, and our backup power solutions ensure your home stays running when the grid goes down.

faqs.question: Can you help with agricultural electrical needs in the Redland area?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We understand the unique requirements of rural and agricultural properties in the Homestead/Redland area, including pump wiring, outbuilding power, and heavy equipment connections.

seoContent.heading: Safe & Reliable Electrical Services for Homestead, FL
seoContent.body: Homestead is a unique blend of historic charm, agricultural heritage, and modern suburban growth. As the 'Gateway to the Keys,' this community faces specific environmental and infrastructure challenges. Solomon Electric provides the expertise needed to keep Homestead homes and businesses powered safely, through every season.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Homestead's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Homestead homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Miami-Dade County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Homestead's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Homestead Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Homestead. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Serving the South Dade Community with Pride
seoContent.body: Whether you're a long-time resident of the historic downtown area or moving into one of Homestead's newer developments like Waterstone, our team of licensed electricians is here to serve you. We provide everything from minor repairs to whole-home backup power systems, ensuring Homestead remains a safe and well-powered place to live and work.
